subject: Diving (Sports Event)
Mentors
lead_paragraph: Greg Louganis, a four-time Olympic gold medalist, will make his debut as a mentor to up-and-coming Americans at this weekend’s USA Diving Grand Prix in Florida.
snippet: Greg Louganis, a four-time Olympic gold medalist, will make his debut as a mentor to up-and-coming Americans at this weekend’s USA Diving Grand Prix in Florida.
